name: Demacian Chicken Royale
description: Golden-fried chicken fit for a Demacian king, served with a side of honor fries.

name: Shuriman Sandburger
description: A towering burger with sun-dried tomatoes and golden Shuriman sauce.

name: Void-Born Double Stacker
description: A dark and mysterious double cheeseburger topped with Vel'Koz's signature 'Void Cheese' sauce.

name: Freljord Mammoth Burger
description: A hearty elk burger infused with Braum's secret sauce, served with crispy tundra chips.

name: Bilgewater Buccaneer Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with grilled pineapple and spicy rum glaze, straight from Bilgewater's finest taverns.

name: Noxian Carnage Burger
description: A triple-meat burger with crimson hot sauce, layered with blood-red tomato and pepper jack cheese.

name: Yordle Snack Stack
description: A bite-sized slider trio with quirky toppings, including Poro-flavored mayo and hextech pickles.

name: Piltover Hexburger
description: A high-tech burger featuring a glowing hextech bun and Caitlyn's precision mustard drizzle.

name: Zaunite Overload Burger
description: A chaotic creation with double patties, shimmer-infused jalape√±os, and a sizzling Zaunite glaze.

name: Ionian Spirit Burger
description: A light yet flavorful tofu burger with Ionian herbs and mystical ginger dressing.

name: Demacian Honor Ale
description: A crisp and refreshing golden ale, brewed with the pride of Demacia.

name: Shuriman Sunbrew
description: A sparkling citrus drink inspired by the golden sands of Shurima.

name: Void Essence Soda
description: A mysterious and fizzy purple soda with a hint of dark berries.

name: Freljord Frostbrew
description: An ice-cold non-alcoholic beer with a hint of mint from the frozen tundra.

name: Bilgewater Grog
description: A classic rum-based mocktail with a splash of tropical juices.

name: Ionian Herbal Tea
description: A calming tea infused with Ionian blossoms and a touch of ginger.
